name: Serving Europe - Branded Food and Beverage Service Chains Association
goal: The aim of Serving Europe is to promote the understanding of the restaurant and coffee shop chain sector through an enhanced dialogue with policy makers and opinion leaders at a European level on matters affecting the modern restaurant sector (i.e. branded, multi-unit, convenience, quality, food and beverage operators).
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Audiovisual and Media, Consumer Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Food Safety, Internal Market, Public Health, Taxation, Youth
euInitiatives:
EU policies and legislative proposals on:
- Nutrition and health
- Food safety and food quality
- Food labelling
- Functioning of the Food Chain
- Contaminants in food
- Waste, litter, packaging waste, food waste
- Sustainability of the Food Chain
- Franchising
- Emoloyment and training
- Advertising and marketing
- Fees on card-based payments
